'''Magrot''' is an [[Orcs of Mordor|Orc of the Southlands]] who is stabbed in the neck by [[Arondir]] using a tree-root. Magrot was invented by [[Amazon Studios]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', where he is portrayed by [[Luke Hawker]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7631058/characters/nm0370015|articlename=Luke Hawker: Magrot|dated=|website=IMDb|accessed=10 September 2022}}</ref>
